name: Sola Flyklubb
about: Sola Flyklubb is one of Norway’s largest and most vibrant aero clubs, with over 250 enthusiastic members. Based at Stavanger Airport, Sola, the club offers a comprehensive flight school providing year-round training for the Private Pilot License (PPL-A). The school conducts theoretical courses from September to March and flight training throughout the year, weather permitting. In addition to single-engine landplane training, Sola Flyklubb also offers night flying and is working to introduce seaplane training. The club boasts a modern fleet of aircraft, a welcoming community, and a well-equipped clubhouse with amenities for members. Sola Flyklubb is an ideal choice for aspiring aviators seeking a blend of hands-on training and a supportive flying community. Join us to embark on an exhilarating journey through the skies.
